children: nti lāmakapurisaṃ tucchapurisaṃ mūḷhapurisaṃ avijjāya andhīkataṃ bālaṃ.

nti atirekena asappurisaṃ. Itare dve vuttapaṭipakkhavasena veditabbā. Sesamettha uttānatthameva. Yathā cettha, evaṃ ito paresu pañcasu. Etesu hi paṭhamaṃ pañcaveravasena desitaṃ, dutiyaṃ assaddhammavasena, tatiyaṃ kāyavacīdvāravasena, catutthaṃ manodvāravasena, pañcamaṃ aṭṭhamicchattavasena, chaṭṭhaṃ dasamicchattavasena.
innerText: 201. Pañcamassa paṭhame asappurisanti lāmakapurisaṃ tucchapurisaṃ mūḷhapurisaṃ avijjāya andhīkataṃ bālaṃ. Asappurisataranti atirekena asappurisaṃ. Itare dve vuttapaṭipakkhavasena veditabbā. Sesamettha uttānatthameva. Yathā cettha, evaṃ ito paresu pañcasu. Etesu hi paṭhamaṃ pañcaveravasena desitaṃ, dutiyaṃ assaddhammavasena, tatiyaṃ kāyavacīdvāravasena, catutthaṃ manodvāravasena, pañcamaṃ aṭṭhamicchattavasena, chaṭṭhaṃ dasamicchattavasena.

children: nti bhaddakaṃ anavajjapuggalaṃ. Sesamettha uttānatthameva. Aṭṭhamepi eseva nayo. Navame
nti anavajjadhammaṃ. Sesamettha uttānatthameva. Dasamepi eseva nayo. Imasmiṃ vagge dasasupi suttesu agāriyappaṭipadā kathitā. Sacepi sotāpannasakadāgāmino honti, vaṭṭatiyevāti.
innerText: 207-210. Sattame pāpanti lāmakaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhapuggalaṃ. Kalyāṇanti bhaddakaṃ anavajjapuggalaṃ. Sesamettha uttānatthameva. Aṭṭhamepi eseva nayo. Navame pāpadhammanti lāmakadhammaṃ. Kalyāṇadhammanti anavajjadhammaṃ. Sesamettha uttānatthameva. Dasamepi eseva nayo. Imasmiṃ vagge dasasupi suttesu agāriyappaṭipadā kathitā. Sacepi sotāpannasakadāgāmino honti, vaṭṭatiyevāti.
